com.javagamemaker.javagameengine

Class JavaGameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.JavaGameEngine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Main, Main, Main, Main, Main, Main, Main, Main

    public class JavaGameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class in the JavaGameEngine gameengine To start your game extend this class and run the start(); function to start the game

      • getWindowSize

        public static Vector2 getWindowSize()
        This function can not be called in a components constructor because the game window has not been initialized yet. If you need the size in the start use the start function instead of the constructor.
        Returns:
        GameWindow size
